item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 11th August
item.description:
Yellow NO Waiting 8 - 6pm Parking sign - and pole has been dumped in behind their railing can this be collected please , looks like its been broken off as rusty on the end , no obivious sign as to where its comes from as cannot see any broken posts in immediate area
Report on FixMyStreet
